workshoptitle: Open-source Data Engineering with MySQL HeatWave

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Building cloud native solution using popular open-source data engineering tools such as Superset, Grafana with MySQL HeatWave

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Oracle Kubernetes Engine
tutorials.description: Create Oracle Kubernetes Engine using OCI Console

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create MySQL HeatWave
tutorials.description: Create MySQL HeatWave using OCI CLI

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Load data into MySQL HeatWave
tutorials.description: Use mysql shell to load airportdb data set to MySQL HeatWave cluster

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Deploy Grafana to Oracle Kubernetes Engine
tutorials.description: Deploy Grafana to Oracle Kubernetes Engine

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Deploy Superset to Oracle Kubernetes Engine
tutorials.description: Deploy Superset to Oracle Kubernetes Engine

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Deploy Zeppelin to Oracle Kubernetes Engine
tutorials.description: Deploy Zeppelin to Oracle Kubernetes Engine

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Deploy PHPAdmin to Oracle Kubernetes Engine
tutorials.description: Deploy PHPAdmin to Oracle Kubernetes Engine

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
